title: BRIEF-Auryn Resources Has Arranged Bridge Loan Commitment For Up To C$6 MLn
text:
BRIEF-Auryn Resources Has Arranged Bridge Loan Commitment For Up To C$6 MLn

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Sep 06, 2019 07:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Auryn Resources Has Arranged Bridge Loan Commitment For Up To C$6 MLn Sept 6 (Reuters) - Auryn Resources Inc : * AURYN RESOURCES - HAS ARRANGED BRIDGE LOAN COMMITMENT FOR UP TO CAD $6 MILLION TO FUND CO'S NEAR TERM CORPORATE AND WORKING CAPITAL NEEDS - SEC FILING * AURYN RESOURCES INC - BRIDGE LOAN WILL BEAR INTEREST AT 10% PER ANNUM AND WILL BE REPAYABLE NO LATER THAN ONE YEAR AFTER THE DATE OF ADVANCEMENT

BRIEF-Auryn Resources Has Arranged Bridge Loan Commitment For Up To C$6 MLn
description: BRIEF-Auryn Resources Has Arranged Bridge Loan Commitment For Up To C$6 MLn
